data.eml:eml: Epibiotic rotifers of Gammarus pulex (L.) (Crustacea, Amphipoda), with descriptions of two new species and notes on the terminology of the trophi

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article De Smet, Willem H., Verolet, Michel (2016): Epibiotic rotifers of Gammarus pulex (L.) (Crustacea, Amphipoda), with descriptions of two new species and notes on the terminology of the trophi. Zootaxa 4107 (3): 301-320, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4107.3.1
